QuestData.Title: Special Delivery for Brivelthwerp
QuestData.Description: I recently came into possession of something that needs to be delivered to a gnome that goes by the name, Brivelthwerp. It's more like Briveltwerp if you ask me.$B$BI want you to take it to him in the southwest, down at the Sunken Dig Site. He's up to something and there's moolah involved... I can smell it!$B$BKeep an eye on what he's doing, $n, and see if you can't get a cut of his profits. A big cut!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the I-Scream Cryocannon to Brivelthwerp at the Sunken Dig Site in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.CompletionText: That's not what I think it is? Is it?!
QuestData.RewardText: <Brivelthwerp eyes you up and down, but becomes overjoyed at the sight of the special delivery.>$B$BWelcome, friend, welcome! I'm going to give you the chance to get involved at the ground level of a once-in-a-lifetime opportuntity.$B$BThe entrepreneurial spirit knows nothing of the differences between the Alliance and the Horde!$B$BTell me... how do you feel about ice cream?
